reviews.review: Great movie.  So many vignettes and yet it was tied together seamlessly.  Hats off to cast and director!

I'm knocking off one star for the treatment of Loki, the supposedly clever god of mischief, acting on a thoroughly harebrained plan. I was so disappointed with that I almost walked out early, but it's a testament to the movie that I stayed and found it thoroughly spellbinding. Excellent moments for most characters, and a great Thanos!

Infinity War delivers on so many levels.  Thanos stands out above the rest but like most Marvel movies every actor comes to play.  Laugh out loud comedy, crowd applause and gut-wrenching scenes make this movie a must see.
After watching this movie I have one simple question. How do people like DC better then Marvel

An excellent film that really lives up to the hype. It is absolutely incredible to see all of the MCU over the past decade build up to this, and it didn't disappoint. The film has almost every character, and uses them all perfectly. All characters retain their personalities and stories which is impressive since there are so many. Action is great and there is some great humor in here as well. The best part of the movie was Thanos. He is a surprisingly deep character and not your run of the mill destroy everything bad guy. Thanos has some well explained motivations and desires. I found myself understanding him. He has become my favorite MCU villain because of how great he is. The movie was tense, funny, emotional and satisfying, making quite an event that I am so happy I was able to see.

Ummmmmmmm Great!!!!!!! Of course the ending floored me but I understand MCU must go on. The show must go on. All the movies Toronto each other do I get that. It was super funny and allowed each to be themselves. It did make me dislike star lord but hey his character is suppose to be bi polar. I love seeing them all have their time in the spotlight. I think they did a great job to have do so many characters. I love Marvel and love Kevin Feige for having the "vision"(poor vision awww) to see the MCU working in connection with each other. Way to convince the powers that be that our ten year ride with you was worth it and we look forward to so so much more.... BRAVO

Although not a superhero fan, I greatly enjoyed this. The film is made by the efficient, pitch-perfect character interactions; something I was expecting to be impossible with so  many. That genuinely subversive, unexpected ending, with implied hints that it is not... If only The Last Jedi or Justice League could have learnt these lessons.
Loved this movie, thoughtit was amazing that they could pull this off!
Loved the movie The Avengers gave it their all but wasn't good enough to defeat the behind the signs big bad from the first Avengers movie!

Fantastic. Worth the decade-long set-up. Not a stand-alone movie, but its not supposed to be, it is part one of a decade's worth of character development and story arc. Great movie. Stormbreaker Thor and all of the hilarious male-ego clashing alone is worth the price of admission.
